title: Chaining commands
text: LaTeX does allow one to run a command inside the content of another command! This is very powerfull and allows for more freedom.

title: A thing about computer programs and mathematics
text: Functions in mathematics can be chained/nested. The inner function is always calculated first. The same goes for program functions and thus LaTeX!

title: Thinking about command names
text: Command names are not choosen randomly. They carry meaning. What could the short bf in \textbf or \emph mean?
